name: Extended Play 02 — Universes Beyond: The Teams

cards.rules_text:
Ascend [i](If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)[/i]
{WB}: Rumi gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
As long as you have the city's blessing, Rumi is a Demon in addition to her other types with “Whenever Rumi attacks, you may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. If you do, exile target nonland permanent.”
cards.notes:
!KPOPDH

Legendary Creature — Human Demon Warrior Bard
Society (and by that I mean everyone not named Dravos) wants to hide this typeline from you

WB

Whenever Rumi enters or attacks, choose one—
• You may pay W/B. If you do, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
• If you have the city's blessing, you may pay WUBRG. If you do, exile target nonland permanent.

cards.rules_text:
Ascend [i](If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)[/i]
When Zoey enters, create an artifact token named Notebook with “{WU}, {T}: You and target opponent each draw a card.”
Whenever you draw a card, if you have the city's blessing, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

Ascend [i](If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)[/i]
Whenever you attack, you may pay {1}{RW}. If you do, create a red enchantment token named Dance Routine with “Creatures you control get +1/+0.”
During your turn, if you have the city's blessing, creatures you control have first strike.

Menace
When Evil Eye enters, it deals X damage to up to one target creature, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. Excess damage is dealt to that permanent's controller.

Haste
Whenever Ken Takakura deals combat damage to a player, or an opponent casts a spell during your turn, that player loses 3 life unless they discard a card or sacrifices a creature.

When Acrobatic Silky enters, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
Whenever you attack with a Spirit creature and a non-Spirit creature, up to two target creatures can't block until end of turn.

When Momo Ayase enters, return up to one other target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, you may discard a card. If you do, or if your hand is empty, draw two cards.

Haste
[i]Valiant[/i] — Whenever Bloom becomes the target of a spell or ability you control for the first time each turn, Bloom gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.

cards.rules_text:
Ward {2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
You may have Vee enter as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except her name is Vee, Realm Escapee, and she has her other abilities.
{3}{U}{U}: Vee can't be blocked until end of turn.

You may cast copies of artifact spells from your graveyard by putting the card on the bottom of your library in addition to paying the spell's other costs.
Partner with Ken Katayanagi, Sixth Ex

When Gideon Graves enters, mill seven cards. When you do, return a card not named Gideon Graves, Seventh Ex with mana value 7 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever you attack with 7 or more total power, each opponent loses 7 life unless they discard cards or sacrifice permanents with total mana value 7 or greater.

As long as you've cast a noncreature spell this turn, Amanda has flying and haste.
Whenever another Wizard you control enters, Amanda gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Whenever you cast a noncreature or Wizard spell, target creature, instant, or sorcery you control gains lifelink until end of turn.
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Jasminka. Then if you have at least 8 life more than your starting life total, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 Servo artifact creature token.
{U}, {T}: The next spell you cast this turn has improvise. [i](Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)[/i]

Deathtouch
Afflict 3 [i](Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Sucy gets +1/+1 and gains noxious 1 until end of turn. [i](When she's blocked, defending player gets a poison counter for each point of noxious she has.)[/i]

Spirited [i](When this permanent enters the battlefield, you may activate one of its activated abilities without paying its cost.)[/i]
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
{4}{U}: You and target opponent each draw a card.

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell from your hand, you may copy it. When you do, put that spell on the bottom of your library, then return target nonland card with lesser mana value from your graveyard to your hand if that card isn't a creature or if {W} was spent to cast that spell.

Whenever you cast a noncreature or Wizard spell, Atsuko Kagari gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{2}{U}, Discard a card: Until end of turn, Atsuko Kagari becomes a Mouse with hexproof.

When Luz enters, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Exile target noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard with mana value 4 or less. Copy it. You may cast the spell without paying its mana cost. Activate only as a sorcery.

Spirited [i](When this permanent enters the battlefield, you may activate one of its activated abilities without paying its cost.)[/i]
{G}{U}{R}, {T}, Put a stun counter on Natsuko: Draw a card, then you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn.

Whenever Lucas Lee or another creature you control dies while attacking, you may pay 1 life. If you do, create a Treasure token.

Whenever you cast your first noncreature spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Todd Ingram and draw a card.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, Todd Ingram phases out. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)[/i]

Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever Luke attacks, you may pay {3}{B}{B}. If you do, exile all nonland permanents.

Reach
Whenever Memmeln enters or attacks, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
{5}{B}, Sacrifice Memmeln: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It's a 6/6 black Horror creature.

Whenever Justice enters or attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play it during your next turn.
{1}{B}{R}, Put a card exiled with Justice into its owner's graveyard: Justice gets +2/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.

Prowess [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever you cast your first noncreature spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

Whenever another creature you control with power 2 or less enters, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
{2}{G}: Until end of turn, Destiny becomes a Human Warrior, gets +X/+X, and gains trample, where X is the number of creatures you control. Activate only once each turn.

[i]Valiant[/i] — Whenever Flora becomes the target of a spell or ability you control for the first time each turn, surveil 1. When you do, you may put a land card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield.

Flying, prowess

Flying

Valiant — Whenever Aisha becomes the target of a spell or ability you control for the first time each turn, mill three cards, then return a card from among the milled cards to your hand. If that card wasn't a land or creature, copy it. You may cast the copy. (You still pay its costs.)

When Gus enters and whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, create a 0/1 blue Illusion creature token.
While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Illusion if able.

When Amity enters, create a 1/1 black Ooze creature token.
{4}{B}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature. It gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of permanent cards in your graveyard. Activate only once each turn.

[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Willow.
Whenever Willow attacks, you may pay {2}{R}{G}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with lesser power than her.

At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play a card exiled with Edalyn this turn.
As long as there are one or less cards in your hand, Edalyn is a Bird Beast with base power and toughness 4/4 and “Spells you cast from anywhere other than your hand cost {2} less.”

You have no maximum hand size.
Whenever you attack, you draw a card and lose 1 life. Then if you have nine or more cards in your hand, you may cast any number of noncreature spells from your hand with mana value 9 or less without paying their mana costs.
